paragraphs.text:
%md
# About
**Lab:** Create Hive Staging Database 
**Objective:** Create a Hive staging database for Cloudfin, use Cloudfin.orc to create a production databasee
**File locations:** hostname:~/data/cloudfin
**Successful outcome:** Create hive staging database
**Before you begin:** N/A
**Related lessons:** Zeppelin

---

msg.data:
About

Lab: Create Hive Staging Database
Objective: Create a Hive staging database for Cloudfin, use Cloudfin.orc to create a production databasee
File locations: hostname:~/data/cloudfin
Successful outcome: Create hive staging database
Before you begin: N/A
Related lessons: Zeppelin

claim_saving.tar.gz
consent_data.tar.gz
employee.tar.gz
eu_country.tar.gz
provider_summary.tar.gz
tax.tar.gz
us_customer.tar.gz
ww_customer.tar.gz

paragraphs.title: 3 - Use tar to extract the gz files
paragraphs.text:
%sh

tar -xvzf /var/data/cloudfin/claim_saving.tar.gz -C /tmp/cloudfin/
tar -xvzf /var/data/cloudfin/consent_data.tar.gz -C /tmp/cloudfin/
tar -xvzf /var/data/cloudfin/employee.tar.gz -C /tmp/cloudfin/
tar -xvzf /var/data/cloudfin/eu_country.tar.gz -C /tmp/cloudfin/
tar -xvzf /var/data/cloudfin/provider_summary.tar.gz -C /tmp/cloudfin/
tar -xvzf /var/data/cloudfin/tax.tar.gz -C /tmp/cloudfin/
tar -xvzf /var/data/cloudfin/us_customer.tar.gz -C /tmp/cloudfin/
tar -xvzf /var/data/cloudfin/ww_customer.tar.gz -C /tmp/cloudfin/

paragraphs.title: 5 - Load datafiles into hdfs
paragraphs.text:
%sh

hdfs dfs -mkdir /data/cloudfin
hdfs dfs -put /tmp/cloudfin/* /data/cloudfin
hdfs dfs -ls /data/cloudfin

paragraphs.title: 6 - Create hive database for cloudfin
7 - Create table claim_saving_stage
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS cloudfin.claim_saving_stage;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE cloudfin.claim_saving_stage(
  claim_date DATE,
  last_name STRING,
  client_id INT,
  claim_number INT,
  claim_code DECIMAL,
  claim_amount DECIMAL,
  risk_factor DECIMAL,
  claim_adjustment DECIMAL
  )
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED
FIELDS TERMINATED BY ','
LOCATION '/warehouse/tablespace/external/hive/cloudfin.db/claim_saving_stage';

LOAD DATA INPATH '/data/cloudfin/claim_saving.csv' OVERWRITE INTO TABLE claim_saving_stage;

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: 9 - Create table consent_data_stage
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS consent_data_stage;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE consent_data_stage(
  country_code STRING,
  country STRING,
  insurance_id INT,
  marketing_consent STRING,
  marketing_consent_start_date DATE,
  loyalty_consent STRING,
  loyalty_consent_start_date DATE,
  third_party_consent STRING,
  third_party_consent_start_date DATE
  )
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED
FIELDS TERMINATED BY ','
LOCATION '/warehouse/tablespace/external/hive/cloudfin.db/consent_data_stage';

LOAD DATA INPATH '/data/cloudfin/consent_data.csv' OVERWRITE INTO TABLE consent_data_stage;

paragraphs.title: 11 - Create table employee_stage
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS employee_stage;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE employee_stage(
  emp_id INT,
  name STRING,
  age INT,
  telephone STRING,
  email STRING,
  birthday DATE,
  country_code STRING,
  salary DECIMAL
  )
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED
FIELDS TERMINATED BY ','
LOCATION '/warehouse/tablespace/external/hive/cloudfin.db/employee_stage';

LOAD DATA INPATH '/data/cloudfin/employee.csv' OVERWRITE INTO TABLE employee_stage;

paragraphs.title: 15 - Create table provider_summary_stage
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS provider_summary_stage;

    provider_id INT,
    company_name STRING,
    address STRING,
    city STRING,
    state_code STRING,
    zip_code STRING,
    regional_office STRING,
    business_years INT,

ROW FORMAT DELIMITED

paragraphs.title: 17 - Create table us_customer_stage
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS us_customer_stage;

    gender STRING,
    title STRING,
    first_name STRING,
    middle_initial STRING,

    address STRING,

    email STRING,

    password STRING,
    telephone STRING,
    telephone_country_code STRING,
    mother_maiden STRING,
    birthday DATE,
    age INT,
    tropical_zodiac STRING,
    cc_type STRING,
    cc_number STRING,
    cvv2 INT,
    cc_expires DATE,
    national_id STRING,
    mrn STRING,
    insurance_id INT,
    eye_color STRING,
    occupation STRING,
    company STRING,
    vehicle STRING,
    domain STRING,
    blood_type STRING,
    weight NUMERIC (6, 2),
    height NUMERIC (6, 2),
    latitude NUMERIC (12, 8),
    longitude NUMERIC (12, 8)
    )
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED
FIELDS TERMINATED BY ','
